text.headline: Freelance ML & AI Research Collaborator
text.text: 20+ practical AI projects in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and Generative AI. Assisted in developing research prototypes and experimental pipelines using TensorFlow and Python. Contributed to model design, data preprocessing, and evaluation for academic publications and theses. Explored novel approaches in deep learning architectures and generative models (GANs, diffusion models, etc.).

text.headline: Associate Software Engineer AI/ML
text.text: Designed a custom vision model for frame selection from camera, achieving 95% accuracy in detecting teeth aligners on a challenging dataset. Worked on transformer based multimodel like audio, text, vision capabilities. PICOS elements & Entity Extraction using spacy & GPT models in health care. Intelligent in selecting the optimal server for model training and inference with regard to cost efficiency.

text.headline: Python Programmer AI/ML
text.text: Comprehensive experience in the entire Data Science lifecycle, from raw data cleaning and advanced data visualization and the development of cutting-edge machine learning models. Analyzing data and building statistical models using Neural Networks to solve specific business problems. Performing Classification, Regression, Time-Series Forecasting, Anomaly detection on Tabular, Textual, Image, Audio and Video data.

text.headline: B.E, Electronics and Communication
text.text: Core Courses: Matrices & Calculus, Problem Solving & Python Programming, Statistics & Numerical Methods, Random Processes & Linear Algebra, C Programming & Data Structures, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Embedded Systems & IOT Design, Signals & Control Systems, Digital Systems Design, Digital Signal Processing, Image Processing, Networks & Security, Communication Systems. Grade: First Class (70.50 %)
